special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The absorber has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Pounce
special_abilities.desc: If the absorber moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits its claws attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the absorber can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

actions.description: The absorber makes three attacks: one with its bite or Mind Bolt and two with its claws.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) force damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) force damage.
actions.name: Claws

actions.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +8 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. Hit: 22 (4d10) psychic damage.
actions.name: Mind Bolt

reactions.name: Tail Ray
reactions.desc: When the absorber takes damage from a spell, the absorber takes only half the triggering damage. If the spellcaster is within 60 feet of the absorber, the absorber can force the caster to make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw. Unless the save succeeds, the caster takes the other half of the damage.

special_abilities.name: Horrid Gnashing
special_abilities.desc:
The nullifier's mouths gnash incoherently while it can see any enemies. Each creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the nullifier and can hear it must make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw. Unless the save succeeds, the creature rolls a d8 to determine what it does during the current turn:
1-4: The creature is stunned until the end of the turn.
5-6: The creature is frightened until the end of the turn and uses its movement to get as far as possible from the nullifier.
7-8: The creature doesn't move, and it uses its action to make one melee attack against a random creature (other than itself) if one is within reach. It otherwise does nothing.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The nullifier has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

spellcasting.desc: The nullifier's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 16). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

actions.description: The nullifier makes three attacks: one with its bites and two with its claws.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 17 (2d12 + 4) piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) force damage.
actions.name: Bites

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 11 (2d10) force damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 16) if it's a creature. The nullifier has two claws, each of which can grapple one creature.
actions.name: Claws

reactions.name: Counterspell
reactions.desc: The nullifier attempts to interrupt a creature that it can see within 60 feet in the process of casting a spell. If the creature is casting a spell of 3rd level or lower, its spell fails and has no effect. If it is casting a spell of 4th level or higher, the nullifier makes a Charisma check with a DC equal to 10 + the spell's level. On a success, the creature's spell fails and has no effect.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The reverser has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.description: The reverser makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, range 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 11 (1d12 + 5) piercing damage plus 6 (1d12) force damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) force damage.
actions.name: Claws

reactions.name: Reversal
reactions.desc: When a creature the reverser can see within 30 feet of it regains hit points, the reverser reduces the number of hit points regained to 0, and the reverser deals 13 (3d8) force damage to the creature.

special_abilities.name: Fear of Fire
special_abilities.desc: If the yeti takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: The yeti has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

special_abilities.name: Snow Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: The yeti has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

actions.description: The yeti can use its Chilling Gaze and makes two claw attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d6 + 7) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) cold damage.
actions.name: Claw

actions.description: The yeti targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the yeti, the target must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw against this magic or take 21 (6d6) cold damage and then be paralyzed for 1 minute, unless it is immune to cold damage. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If the target's saving throw is successful, or if the effect ends on it, the target is immune to this yeti's gaze for 1 hour.
actions.name: Chilling Gaze

actions.description: The yeti exhales a 30-foot cone of frigid air. Each creature in that area must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw, taking 45 (10d8) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Cold Breath (Recharge 6)

special_abilities.name: Fear of Fire
special_abilities.desc: If the yeti takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: The yeti has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

special_abilities.name: Snow Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: The yeti has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

actions.description: The yeti can use its Chilling Gaze and makes two claw attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) cold damage.
actions.name: Claw

actions.description: The yeti targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the yeti, the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw against this magic or take 10 (3d6) cold damage and then be paralyzed for 1 minute, unless it is immune to cold damage. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If the target's saving throw is successful, or if the effect ends on it, the target is immune to the Chilling Gaze of all yetis (but not abominable yetis) for 1 hour.
actions.name: Chilling Gaze

special_abilities.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
special_abilities.desc: The knife is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the knife must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While the knife remains motionless and isn't flying, it is indistinguishable from a normal knife.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.
actions.name: Dagger

name: Animated Tree
subtitle: Huge plant, unaligned
languages: understands Common, Druidic, Elvish, and Sylvan but cannot speak

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While the tree remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal tree.

special_abilities.name: Siege Monster
special_abilities.desc: The tree deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.description: The tree makes two slam attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Slam

actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, range 60/180 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Rock

actions.description: The tree magically animates one or two trees it can see within 60 feet of it. These trees have the same statistics as a tree, except they have Intelligence and Charisma scores of 1, they can't speak, and they have only the Slam action option. An animated tree acts as an ally of the tree. The tree remains animate for 1 day or until it dies; until the tree dies or is more than 120 feet from the tree; or until the tree takes a bonus action to turn it back into an inanimate tree. The tree then takes root if possible.
actions.name: Animate Trees (1/Day)

special_abilities.name: Blood Curse of Binding (1/Day)
special_abilities.desc: As a bonus action, the blood hunter targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or have its speed reduced to 0 and be unable to take reactions. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

special_abilities.name: Blood Frenzy
special_abilities.desc: The blood hunter has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The blood hunter has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

spellcasting.desc: The blood hunter can innately cast hex. Its innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence.

actions.description: The blood hunter attacks twice with a weapon.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.
actions.name: Greatsword

actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage.
actions.name: Heavy Crossbow

special_abilities.name: Dark One's Blessing
special_abilities.desc: When Bol'bara reduces a hostile creature to 0 hit points, she gains 6 temporary hit points.

special_abilities.name: Nimble Escape
special_abilities.desc: Bol'bara can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of her turns.

special_abilities.name: Possessed Alignment
special_abilities.desc: When Bol'bara is fully possessed, her alignment becomes Chaotic Evil.

spellcasting.desc: Bol'bara's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

actions.description: Bol'bara makes two melee attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Dagger

actions.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +4 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) force damage.
actions.name: Eldritch Blast (Cantrip)

special_abilities.name: Bladed Hide
special_abilities.desc: At the start of each of its turns, the moorbounder deals 5 (2d4) piercing damage to any creature grappling it.

special_abilities.name: Standing Leap
special_abilities.desc: The moorbounder's long jump is up to 40 feet and its high jump is up to 20 feet, with or without a running start.

actions.description: The moorbounder makes two attacks: one with its blades and one with its claws.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.
actions.name: Blades

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (4d4 + 4) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claws

name: Core Spawn Crawler
subtitle: Small aberration, chaotic evil
languages: understands Deep Speech but can't speak

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The crawler has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the crawler's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.description: The crawler makes four attacks: one with its bite, two with its claws, and one with its tail.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened until the start of the crawler's next turn.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claws

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Tail

name: Core Spawn Emissary
subtitle: Medium aberration, chaotic evil
languages: telepathy 120 ft., understands Deep Speech but can't speak

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The emissary has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.description: The emissary makes three talons attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) slashing damage.
actions.name: Talons

actions.description: The emissary emits a dreadful yet alluring hum. Each creature within 20 feet of the emissary that can hear it and that isn't an aberration must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be charmed for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
actions.name: Alluring Thrum (Recharges 5-6)

actions.description: A 15-foot-radius cloud of toxic crystalline spores extends out from the emissary. The spores spread around corners. Each creature in the area must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned. While poisoned in this way, a creature takes 11 (2d10) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
actions.name: Crystal Spores (Recharge 6)

name: Core Spawn Seer
subtitle: Medium aberration, chaotic evil
languages: Common, Deep Speech, telepathy 120 ft., Undercommon

special_abilities.name: Earth Glide
special_abilities.desc: The seer can traverse through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the seer doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The seer has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.description: The seer uses Fission Staff twice, Psychedelic Orb twice, or each one once.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 9 (1d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) radiant damage, and the target is knocked prone.
actions.name: Fission Staff

actions.description: The seer hurls a glimmering orb at one creature it can see within 120 of it. The target must succeed on a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw or take 27 (5d10) psychic damage and suffer a random condition until the start of the seer's next turn. Roll a d6 for the condition: (1-2) blinded, (3-4) frightened, or (5-6) stunned.
actions.name: Psychedelic Orb

reactions.name: Fuse Damage
reactions.desc: When the seer is hit by an attack, it takes only half of the triggering damage. The first time the seer hits with a melee attack on its next turn, the target takes an extra 1d6 radiant damage.

name: Core Spawn Worm
subtitle: Gargantuan aberration, chaotic evil
languages: understands Deep Speech but can't speak

special_abilities.name: Illumination
special_abilities.desc: The worm sheds dim light in a 20-foot radius.

special_abilities.name: Radiant Mirror
special_abilities.desc: If the worm takes radiant damage, each creature within 20 feet of it takes that damage as well.

special_abilities.name: Tunneler
special_abilities.desc: The worm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

actions.description: The worm makes two attacks: one with its barbed tentacles and one with its bite.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 25 (5d6 + 8) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 18). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained. The tentacles can grapple only one creature at a time.
actions.name: Barbed Tentacles

actions.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (5d8 + 8) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the worm. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the worm, and takes 21 (6d6) fire damage at the start of each of the worm's turns.
If the worm takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the worm must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the worm. If the worm dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting prone.
actions.name: Bite

name: Damaged Flesh Golem
subtitle: Medium construct, neutral

damage_immunities.index: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
damage_immunities.name: *from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

special_abilities.name: Berserk
special_abilities.desc:
Whenever the golem starts its turn with 40 hit points or fewer, roll a d6. On a 6, the golem goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the golem attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the golem attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the golem goes berserk, it continues to do so until it is destroyed or regains all its hit points.
The golem's creator, if within 60 feet of the berserk golem, can try to calm it by speaking firmly and persuasively. The golem must be able to hear its creator, who must take an action to make a DC 15 Charisma (Persuasion) check. If the check succeeds, the golem ceases being berserk. If it takes damage while still at 40 hit points or fewer, the golem might go berserk again.

special_abilities.name: Aversion of Fire
special_abilities.desc: If the golem takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Immutable Form
special_abilities.desc: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

special_abilities.name: Lightning Absorption
special_abilities.desc: Whenever the golem is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Magic Weapons
special_abilities.desc: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Slam

name: Ferol Sal
subtitle: Medium undead, neutral evil

damage_resistances.index: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered
damage_resistances.name: *from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

languages: the languages it knew in life

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: While in sunlight, Ferol has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.description: Ferol makes two longsword attacks or two longbow attacks. It can use its Life Drain in place of one longsword attack.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.
A humanoid slain by this attack rises 24 hours later as a zombie under Ferol's control, unless the humanoid is restored to life or its body is destroyed. Ferol can have no more than twelve zombies under its control at one time.
actions.name: Life Drain

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands.
actions.name: Longsword

actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Longbow

special_abilities.name: Numbing Aura
special_abilities.desc: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the zombie must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. Unless the save succeeds, the creature can't make more than one attack, or take a bonus action on that turn.

special_abilities.name: Undead Fortitude
special_abilities.desc: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is fire, radiant, or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

actions.description: The zombie makes two weapon attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 25 (3d12 + 6) slashing damage.
actions.name: Greataxe

actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Hurl Rock

actions.description: The zombie targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or take 35 (10d6) cold damage and be paralyzed until the end of its next turn.
actions.name: Freezing Stare

special_abilities.name: Freezing Body
special_abilities.desc: A creature that touches the worm or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 10 (3d6) cold damage.

special_abilities.name: Death Burst
special_abilities.desc: When the worm dies, it explodes in a burst of frigid energy. Each creature within 60 feet of it must make a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 (8d6) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Creatures inside the worm when it dies automatically fail this saving throw.

special_abilities.name: Tunneler
special_abilities.desc: The worm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

actions.description: The worm makes two bite attacks, or uses its Trill and makes a bite attack.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (3d8 + 9) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) cold damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the worm. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the worm, and takes 10 (3d6) acid damage and 10 (3d6) cold damage at the start of each of the worm's turns.
If the worm takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the worm must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the worm.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: The frost worm emits a haunting cry. Each creature within 60 feet of the worm that can hear it must succeed on a DC 20 Wisdom saving throw or be stunned for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw each time it takes damage and at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Once a creature successfully saves against this effect, or if this effect ends for it, that creature is immune to the Trill of all frost worms for the next 24 hours. Frost worms are immune to this effect.
actions.name: Trill

name: Gearkeeper Construct
subtitle: Large construct, unaligned
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

special_abilities.name: Immutable Form
special_abilities.desc: The gearkeeper is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

special_abilities.name: Rapid Shifting
special_abilities.desc: Opportunity attacks made against the gearkeeper have disadvantage.

special_abilities.name: Whirling Blades
special_abilities.desc: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the gearkeeper takes 4 (1d8) slashing damage.

actions.description: The gearkeeper makes two Arm Blade attacks, or one Arm Blade attack and one Spear Launcher attack.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (3d8 + 5) slashing damage.
actions.name: Arm Blade

actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, range 90 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage, and the target is knocked prone.
actions.name: Spear Launcher

actions.description: The gearkeeper jettisons a spray of jagged metal in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Shrapnel Blast (Recharge 6)

special_abilities.name: Shadowstep
special_abilities.desc: As a bonus action, the gloomstalker can teleport up to 40 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: While in sunlight, the gloomstalker has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.description: The gloomstalker makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.
actions.name: Claws

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 17). While grappled in this way, the target is restrained.
actions.name: Snatch

actions.description: The gloomstalker emits a terrible shriek. Each enemy within 60 feet of the gloomstalker that can hear it must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed until the end of the enemy's next turn.
actions.name: Shriek (Recharge 6)

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The wolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The wolf has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.description: The wolf makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (1d10 + 6) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) piercing damage.
actions.name: Claws

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The tortoise can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Massive Frame
special_abilities.desc:
The tortoise can carry up to 20,000 pounds of weight atop its shell, but moves at half speed if the weight exceeds 10,000 pounds. Medium or smaller creatures can move underneath the tortoise while it's not prone.
Any creature under the tortoise when it falls prone is grappled (escape DC 18). Until the grapple ends, the creature is prone and restrained.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (3d12 + 9) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: The tortoise withdraws into its shell, falls prone, and gains a +5 bonus to AC. While the tortoise is in its shell, its speed is 0 and can't increase. The tortoise can emerge from its shell as an action, whereupon it is no longer prone.
actions.name: Shell Defense (Recharge 4-6)

special_abilities.name: Dark Devotion
special_abilities.desc: Hulil has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

spellcasting.desc: Hulil is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 11, +3 to hit with spell attacks). Hulil has the following cleric spells prepared:

actions.description: Hulil makes two melee attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Dagger

name: Husk Zombie
subtitle: Medium undead, neutral evil
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

special_abilities.name: Curse of the Husk
special_abilities.desc: A humanoid slain by a melee attack from the zombie revives as a husk zombie on its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Undead Fortitude
special_abilities.desc: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

actions.description: The zombie makes two claw attacks. For each of these attacks that reduces a creature to 0 hit points, the zombie can make an additional claw attack.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claw

special_abilities.name: Fey Ancestry
special_abilities.desc: Ishel has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put Ishel to sleep.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: While in sunlight, Ishel has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

spellcasting.desc: Ishel's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 11). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Shortsword

actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also unconscious while poisoned in this way. The target wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.
actions.name: Hand Crossbow

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
special_abilities.desc: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.description: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (2d10 + 10) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d6 + 10) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claw

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (2d8 + 10) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Tail

actions.description: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a DC 21 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.
actions.name: Frightful Presence

actions.description:
The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.
Cold Breath.: The dragon exhales an icy blast in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 24 Constitution saving throw, taking 67 (15d8) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
Paralyzing Breath.: The dragon exhales paralyzing gas in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 24 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
actions.name: Breath Weapons (Recharge 5-6)

actions.description:
The dragon magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating no higher than its own, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the dragon's choice).
In a new form, the dragon retains its alignment, hit points, Hit Dice, ability to speak, proficiencies, Legendary Resistance, lair actions, and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, as well as this action. Its statistics and capabilities are otherwise replaced by those of the new form, except any class features or legendary actions of that form.
actions.name: Change Shape

special_abilities.name: Messy End
special_abilities.desc: The kobold explodes 3 rounds after it dies, or immediately if it was killed by a critical hit. The explosion destroys the kobold's body, leaving its equipment behind. Each creature within 5 feet of the exploding kobold must make a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw, taking 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.name: Shortsword

actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.name: Hand Crossbow

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The merrow can breathe air and water.

spellcasting.desc: The merrow is a 6th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). The merrow has the following druid spells prepared:

actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the merrow can pull it 10 feet closer.
actions.name: Harpoon

actions.description: The merrow unleashes a stroke of lightning in a line 100 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 (8d6) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Lightning Bolt (3rd-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)

special_abilities.name: Standing Leap
special_abilities.desc: The moorbounder's long jump is up to 40 feet and its high jump is up to 20 feet, with or without a running start.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (4d4 + 4) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claws

name: Mossback Steward
subtitle: Gargantuan monstrosity, unaligned
languages: telepathy 120 ft, understands Goblin, Common, and Primordial but can't speak

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: Mossback Steward can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Massive Frame
special_abilities.desc:
Mossback Steward can carry up to 20,000 pounds of weight atop its shell, but moves at half speed if the weight exceeds 10,000 pounds. Medium or smaller creatures can move underneath Mossback Steward while it's not prone.
Any creature under Mossback Steward when it falls prone is grappled (escape DC 18). Until the grapple ends, the creature is prone and restrained.

spellcasting.desc: Mossback Steward's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 15). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (3d12 + 9) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Mossback Steward withdraws into its shell, falls prone, and gains a +5 bonus to AC. While Mossback Steward is in its shell, its speed is 0 and can't increase. Mossback Steward can emerge from its shell as an action, whereupon it is no longer prone.
actions.name: Shell Defense (Recharge 4-6)

damage_resistances.index: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered
damage_resistances.name: *from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

special_abilities.name: Shadow Stealth
special_abilities.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the nergaliid can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

special_abilities.name: Standing Leap
special_abilities.desc: The nergaliid's long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 20 feet, with or without a running start.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 minute. The poisoned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Tongue Lash

actions.description: The nergaliid magically draws the life from a humanoid it can see within 40 feet of it. The target must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. An incapacitated target fails the save automatically. On a failed save, the creature takes 10 (3d6) psychic damage, and the nergaliid gains temporary hit points equal to the damage taken. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage, and the nergaliid doesn't gain temporary hit points. If this damage kills the target, its body rises at the end of the nergaliid's current turn as a husk zombie (see earlier in this chapter).
actions.name: Siphon Life (Recharge 4-6)

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Greatclub

actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Javelin

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: Old Croaker can breathe air and water

special_abilities.name: Standing Leap
special_abilities.desc: Old Croaker's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) poison damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and Old Croaker can't bite another target.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description:
Old Croaker makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside Old Croaker, and it takes 10 (3d6) acid damage at the start of each of Old Croaker's turns. Old Croaker can have only one target swallowed at a time.
If Old Croaker dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting prone.
actions.name: Swallow

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The dragon can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
special_abilities.desc: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.description: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +15 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (2d10 + 8) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) acid damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d6 + 8) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claw

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +15 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Tail

actions.description: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.
actions.name: Frightful Presence

actions.description: The dragon exhales acid in a 90-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 22 Dexterity saving throw, taking 67 (15d8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Acid Breath (Recharge 5-6)

special_abilities.name: Divine Eminence
special_abilities.desc: As a bonus action, Pellinost can expend a spell slot to cause its melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 10 (3d6) radiant damage to a target on a hit. This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If Pellinost expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by 1d6 for each level above 1st.

spellcasting.desc: Pellinost is a 5th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). Pellinost has the following cleric spells prepared:

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Mace

name: Raegrin Mau
subtitle: Medium humanoid(elf), lawful or chaotic good or evil
alignment: lawful or chaotic good or evil

special_abilities.name: Dark Devotion
special_abilities.desc: Raegrin has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.
actions.name: Scimitar

special_abilities.name: Blood Frenzy
special_abilities.desc: The warlock has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

special_abilities.name: Limited Amphibiousness
special_abilities.desc: The warlock can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

special_abilities.name: Shark Telepathy
special_abilities.desc: The warlock can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

spellcasting.desc: The warlock's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

actions.description: The warlock makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its Sword of Fathoms.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or begin choking. The choking creature is incapacitated until the end of its next turn, when the effect ends on it.
actions.name: Sword of Fathoms

actions.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (1d10) force damage.
actions.name: Eldritch Blast (Cantrip)

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The sea fury can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
special_abilities.desc: If the sea fury fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The sea fury has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

spellcasting.desc: The sea fury's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

actions.description: The sea fury makes two attacks with its claws.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claws

actions.description: The sea fury targets one frightened creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or drop to 0 hit points.
actions.name: Death Glare

special_abilities.name: Stench
special_abilities.desc: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the shadowghast must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to this Stench for 24 hours.

special_abilities.name: Shadow Stealth
special_abilities.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the shadowghast can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

actions.description: The shadowghast makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) slashing damage plus 5 (1d10) necrotic damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage. If the target is a creature other than an undead, it must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
actions.name: Claws

special_abilities.name: Blood Frenzy
special_abilities.desc: The abomination has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

special_abilities.name: Water Breathing
special_abilities.desc: The abomination can breathe only underwater.

special_abilities.name: Limited Amphibiousness
special_abilities.desc: The abomination can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

special_abilities.name: Powerful Build
special_abilities.desc: Sken counts as one size larger when determining her carrying capacity and the weight she can push, drag, or lift.

special_abilities.name: Special Equipment
special_abilities.desc: Sken wears a ring of obscuring. With it, she can cast the fog cloud spell centered on herself three times per day. The cloud lasts for 1 minute (no concentration required).

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage when used with two hands.
actions.name: Longsword

reactions.name: Stone's Endurance (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
reactions.desc: When Sken takes damage, she can use her reaction to reduce the damage taken by 8 (1d12 + 2).

special_abilities.name: Hold Breath
special_abilities.desc: Skr'a S'orsk can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

spellcasting.desc: Skr'a S'orsk is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). Skr'a S'orsk has the following druid spells prepared:

actions.description: Skr'a S'orsk makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.
actions.name: Multiattack (Lizardfolk Form Only)

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage in crocodile form. If Skr'a S'orsk is in crocodile form and the target is a Large or smaller creature, the target is grappled (escape DC 12). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and Skr'a S'orsk can't bite another target. If Skr'a S'orsk reverts to its true form, the grapple ends.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claws (Lizardfolk Form Only)

actions.description: Skr'a S'orsk magically polymorphs into a crocodile, remaining in that form for up to 1 hour. It can revert to its true form as a bonus action. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.
actions.name: Change Shape (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

special_abilities.name: Swarm
special_abilities.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny snake. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. Hit: 7 (2d6) piercing damage, or 3 (1d6) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer. The target must make a DC 10 Constitution saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Bites

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The basilisk can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Petrifying Secretions
special_abilities.desc: A creature must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw if it hits the basilisk with a weapon attack while within 5 feet of it or if it starts its turn grappled by the basilisk. Unless the save succeeds, the creature magically begins to turn to stone and is restrained, and it must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is petrified.

actions.description: The basilisk makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 12).
actions.name: Tail

actions.description: Three Earrings makes three melee attacks: two with its scimitar and one with its dagger. Or Three Earrings makes two ranged attacks with its daggers.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.
actions.name: Scimitar

actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.name: Dagger

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: Three Earrings adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, Three Earrings must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

special_abilities.name: Charge
special_abilities.desc: If the udaak moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a slam attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 27 (6d8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 21 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 20 feet away from the udaak and knocked prone.

special_abilities.name: Siege Monster
special_abilities.desc: The udaak deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.description: The udaak makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its slam.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 21 (2d12 + 8) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 21). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the udaak can't bite another target.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Slam

actions.description:
The udaak makes one bite attack against a Large or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is also swallowed, and the grapple ends. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the udaak, and it takes 21 (6d6) acid damage at the start of each of the udaak's turns.
If the udaak takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the udaak must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the udaak. If the udaak dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting prone.
actions.name: Swallow

special_abilities.name: Voice Lock
special_abilities.desc: The vox seeker must move toward and attack the source of the nearest voice within 60 feet of it, to the exclusion of all other targets, for as long as it remains operational.

special_abilities.name: Spider Climb
special_abilities.desc: The vox seeker can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage plus 3 lightning damage.
actions.name: Pincer

special_abilities.name: Fey Ancestry
special_abilities.desc: Yinra has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
special_abilities.desc: Yinra has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.name: Shortsword

actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.
